title: Captain Bleemadge

properties.name: description
properties.value: Captain Bleemadge is the gnome glider pilot stationed at the top of the White Wolf Mountain (Sindarpos). A player may ride on his glider to the Grand Tree.

The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Captain Bleemadge
Captain Bleemadge
Released7 August 2006 (Update)
MembersYes
RaceGnome
LocationWhite Wolf Mountain
QuestOne Small Favour
GenderMale
OptionsGlider, Talk-to
ExamineHuzzah!
Map
Advanced data
NPC ID6090, 10459, 10461, 10462, 10463, 10464, 10465, 10466

Captain Bleemadge is the gnome glider pilot stationed at the top of the White Wolf Mountain (Sindarpos). A player may ride on his glider to the Grand Tree.

During One Small Favour, the player must make him some Guthix rest to warm him up.

He is also a hard customer of the minigame Gnome Restaurant but does not give any special rewards such as gnome goggles or the gnome scarf.

Treasure Trails[edit | edit source]

  • Captain Bleemadge is the solution to the hard cryptic clue: This aviator is at the peak of his profession. Players will need to solve a puzzle box.

Gnome Restaurant Tips[edit | edit source]

Note that the amounts of the rewards are incomplete and are being updated with the variable range of the items given.

Drop rates estimated based on 1,391 deliveries from the Drop Rate Project, unless otherwise cited.
